document.full_text: samsung electronics co. and lg display, the world's top two flat-screen makers, expect the depressed lcd market to start rebounding as demand rises in china and new tv models are rolled out.
document.title: lg display, samsung see depressed lcd market turning
lines_and_colors: samsung electronics co. and lg display, the world's top two flat-screen makers, expect the depressed lcd market to start rebounding as demand rises in china and new tv models are rolled out.
